Question
========

Suppose John and you are participating in a game show. There are four doors. Behind one of the doors is a car; behind the other three are bicycles. Your friend John, opens door #1, with a bicycle behind it. What is the probability of encountering the car when opening one of the remaining doors?

Answerlist
----------

* 25%
* 33%
* 50%
* 100%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 25%: Incorrect
* 33%: Correct
* 50%: Incorrect
* 100%: Incorrect
